%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Stone Skin
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]You get 15% melee damage protection upon equipping the artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Receiving melee damage grants you Stone skin stack.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]With receiving stack you get additional 15% melee damage protection but receive 10% speed penalty.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each stack grows protection with diminishing returns and penalize speed more.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Maximum 10 stacks is possible, at which you receive 75% reduction of melee damage but become completely immobilized.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect lasts for 10 seconds, after which all stacks are burned.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple artefact increase the rate of gaining stacks.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Disintegrator
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Disintegrates part of the bullet coming to you. Unfortunately in the process a lot of radiation is emitted, making you ill.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Reduces bullet damage by 15%.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Reduced amount of damage is converted to radiation.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts with diminishing returns.
%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Letyshops Time\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Receive 4% cashback on each buy.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Critical Ascensi0n
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Consecutive hits give 5% bonus to damage of your next shot.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Hitting enemy in the critical place gives 10% bonus.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Missing the shot resets the bonus stack and gives psy damage penalty proportional to the stack you had.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Bonus can be stacked infinitely as long as you don't miss.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each extra artefact adds 2.5% to both normal and critical hits.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Unequipping all Spike artefacts will remove the stack without penalties.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Light of Tranquility\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Restores health and psy while being near campfire, amplifies psy recovery artefacts near campfire.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect stacks with each artefact on belt.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Minor Laceration
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Your weapon loses 50% of raw power but gains the ability to deal bleeding damage.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]With each hit the enemy will receive a bleeding stack and start to slowly loose health proportionally to weapon raw power.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]NPCs will have more chance to fall in wounded state, where they beg for mercy and might give you valuable information, if you reach them before they die.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple artefacts increase the efficiency of bleeding stacks.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Zone Alchemy
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]With Bat in the backpack you have the ability to transmutate your artefacts.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Artefacts can be "upgraded" i.e. changed to a better tier (Night Star -> Gravi -> Gold Fish), or can be "mutated" i.e. changed to different type retaining same tier (Night Star -> Stone Blood -> Jellyfish)
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Top tier artefacts can only be mutated.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Perk artefacts can only be mutated.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Unique artefacts, including Bat itself, can't be transmutated.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each transmutation will cost you one Bat artefact.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Solar Powered\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gives health and stamina boost at clear weather, little stamina boost at partly clear and stamina penalty at not clear and at night.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect stacks with each artefact on belt.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Will to Live\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gives stronger health regen the less health you have if you have lower than 25% of health up to that amount.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]More artefacts increase the regen and slightly increases the highest health to trigger.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]The Weight Of Devotion
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Provides small health and stamina regen.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Members of Sin triple the effect of the artefact and add psy regen.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Sin companions receive health regen one by one, starting from the one with the lowest health.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack in any way.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Arszi's Blessing\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Converts radiation illness to stamina boost and gives light radiation cure.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]More artefacts make boost bigger but less continuous.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]The Unorthodox Way Of Travelling
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Killing anyone will teleport you to the place of your victim's death.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Don't try this on crows.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack in any way.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Deal with the Devil
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gamechanger Artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Moving the artefact to belt will sign the Pact with the Zone.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The Zone empowers your Knot and it becomes the mysterious artefact also known as Lucifer.
 
 Saving the game is highly recommended before activation

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]That Insane Stalker from the Freedom faction
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Provides major psy resistance.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Drains psy health to restore health.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]When health is full, restores psy health.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]There is a chance that you perform one of crazy uncontrollable actions.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The lower the psy health, the higher the chance and severity of action.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack in any way.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Zone Infusion
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stepping into anomaly of various types infuses your active weapon.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Infused weapon loses 30% of its raw power but gains 50% of elemental damage power according to the anomaly type.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Only electric, thermal and chemical anomalies are valid for infusion, including fields.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect lasts for 3 minutes, the artefact must be equipped for the effect to work.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]You can drop the artefact onto the weapon to infuse it directly with random effect. The effect would last 10 minutes and the artefact would be destroyed after infusion.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack in any way.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]What Colour Is Your Blood?\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Drains satiety to cure bleeding.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple artefacts increase the cure but also increase the drain.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Dodge This
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has 20% chance to reflect 35% of bullet damage back.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Nullify the damage of hit on reflection.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]More artefacts increase the chance to reflect with diminishing returns.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Necessary Gluttony\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Provides health bonus on food consume based on its callories.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect prolongs with each artefact on belt.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Crack the Jackpot\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon killing an npc in the head spawn extra money in a fashionable way.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]More artefacts will spawn more money items.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Phantom Pacifist
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Become invisible to anybody for about 6 minutes of total usage.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]You can't draw a weapon, talk to anybody or interact with anything.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack in any way.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]The (Un)lucky charm
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]35% chance that incoming bullet damage will be fully redirected to your companion.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Some companions are smarter than others and they'll smell something fishy before they die.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts with diminishing returns.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Friend of the Night
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gives bleeding cure and speed increase from dusk till dawn at any weather.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Decreases sleepiness at night, increases sleepiness at day.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect stacks with each artefact on belt.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Godzilla is Approaching
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Restores batteries charge of items while sprinting.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Won't revive completely dead batteries or devices with no batteries.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]More artefacts gives more recharge rate and slight increase in sprint speed.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]The Nutcracker
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Tier Based Artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Amplifies player's mighty foot and allows him to kick more mutants, resulting in instant death.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each artefact on the belt allows kicking more monsters.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has a cooldown of 2 seconds with 1 artefact, increases with more artefacts on belt by 1 second each.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Enlightening Kleptomania
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The artefact catches frequencies of packages and sends energy to light them up.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Lights up stashes and items emitting signal to RF-receiver.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The light is very dim and hardly visible at day, so searching at night is advisable.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack in any way.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Stunner
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Tapeworm can stun nearest monster if the monster is inside 2 meters radius from the artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Also, getting melee hit by monsters or stalkers will make them stunned.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Affected enemy will be stunned for 3 seconds.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]While being stunned the enemy is disabled in fight and won't attack.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has a cooldown of 6 seconds between uses.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each extra artefact adds additional 2 seconds to effect.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Getting hurt by yourself (for example, falling down from a height) will result in artefact discharge. Don't hurt yourself and stay safe

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Culinary Hyperversity
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Convert energy of raw mutant meat to special abilities.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Extra artefacts or eating same meat multiple times does not stack the effect.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Last for 1 minute, eating different mutant meat overrides previous time and resets.
 
 %c[d_orange]Table of effects: 
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Flesh meat: %c[ui_gray_3]1%/sec health regen, 33% bullet damage penalty.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Boar meat: %c[ui_gray_3]25% melee damage reduction.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Dog meat: %c[ui_gray_3]slight bleeding cure, 1%/sec psy regen.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Pseudodog: %c[ui_gray_3]2%/sec psy regen, 25% psy damage reduction.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Bloodsucker: %c[ui_gray_3]become invisible until shooting or hitting enemy, moderate bleeding cure.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Psysucker: %c[ui_gray_3]become invisible until shooting or hitting enemy, 5%/sec psy regen.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Snork: %c[ui_gray_3]50% radiation damage reduction, 5%/sec stamina regen, 5msv/sec radiation cure, big satiety decrease.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Chimera: %c[ui_gray_3]2%/sec health regen, 10%/sec stamina regen, 33% raditation damage reduction.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Lurker: %c[ui_gray_3]33% chem/fire/electric anomaly damage reduction, including fields.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Tushkano: %c[ui_gray_3]20% speed increase, 20% melee damage penalty.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Rain of Revival. 
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon receiving a fatal blow, the artefact is destroyed and player is revived.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]50% of health is restored, all debuffs are healed and 5 seconds of immunity are granted.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon reviving current weapon is dropped and vision is screwed up.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack in any way.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Crank High Voltage
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stepping on Electra will fully recharge player's batteries of active devices.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Recharges random amount of devices and batteries combined in the inventory.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gives infinite sprint for some time.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Sometimes the pleasure of fresh charge is too big to handle, making you scream a bit more excited than usual.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack in any way.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Bloodlust
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]10% Increase of melee damage.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Vampire effect: 3.5% of new melee damage is converted to player's health.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon killing certain mutants spawns raw chunk of meat near him.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]Good ol' Ultra-Violence
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]5% chance that the shot would be explosive.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon killing an npc or mutant with explosive shot it will explode violently.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Explosion spawn meaty gibs and hurts everyone in the radius.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]User's discretion is advised.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple artefacts increase the chance to explode.
